data.title: Miklos Rozsa Papers An inventory of his papers at Syracuse University
data.text: Non-commercial recordings Audiotapes This series contains audiotapes (mostly 1/4" reels). Audiotapes are boxed, and should be requested by title, box, and ID number. For example, for the first item below, ask for "3 Hungarian Sketches, Op. 14 [Part 1 and 2], Oversize 360, item rozsa_174." RESTRICTED: Researcher access to recordings requires advance notice in order to produce a working copy. (1/4 inch audio tape) (ID#: rozsa_178) Ben Hur Album IV. 13 [14 tracks] [empty reel in box] - Empty reel.
